sentences.en: ...the International Covenant on Civil and Political Rights.
sentences.cn: …公民权利和政治权利国际公约。

sentences.en: But some like me think that they found the Ark of the Covenant.
sentences.cn: 但有些人跟我一样认为是找到了方舟.

sentences.en: Covenant and grace: God guarantees his saving love to his people.
sentences.cn: 盟约与恩典; 神保证?对?所拯救的人的爱.

sentences.en: God intends the family to be a covenant unit.
sentences.cn: 上帝的旨意是﹕家庭是祂立约的对象,是[约民]的基本单位.
上帝与亚伯拉罕的立约

sentences.en: Houma Covenant written on jade and stone pieces, Spring and Autumn Period.
sentences.cn: 图为写在玉、石片上的汉字:春秋时期的《侯马盟书》.

sentences.en: I have made a covenant with mine eyes.
sentences.cn: 我已经和我的眼睛订下约法了.

sentences.en: If you make regular gifts through a covenant we can reclaim the income tax which you have already paid on this money.
sentences.cn: 如果你签订契约定期捐赠，那么我们可以要求返还你这笔钱上交的所得税。

sentences.en: Individually they were no match for even a Covenant single ship.
sentences.cn: 他们这种特性与圣约人的一艘飞船不同.

sentences.en: It is the sign of a great covenant between Man and God.
sentences.cn: 它是人与神的伟大契约的标志.

sentences.en: The covenant of grace is principally between God and the elect.
sentences.cn: 恩典之约主要是神和被拣选者之间的关系.

sentences.en: The covenant of grace was inaugurated in the garden , post lapsum.
sentences.cn: 堕落之后,恩典之约是在伊甸园里被启动的.

sentences.en: The covenant of the League of Nations bound all signatory states not to go to war.
sentences.cn: 国际联盟盟约规定,所有签字国都不得诉诸战争.

sentences.en: The effect of the statute was to annul this covenant.
sentences.cn: 但州法规废除了这一契约.

sentences.en: The money was given to us by deed of covenant.
sentences.cn: 这笔钱是根据契约书付给我们的.

sentences.en: Two Covenant ships sluggishly changed course and intercepted the MAC slugs.
sentences.cn: 两艘圣约人飞船缓慢转变方向拦截磁力加速炮弹.

phrases.tran_cn: n. 约柜（藏于古犹太圣殿至圣所内、刻有十诫的两块石板）
(基督教神学)新约（上帝和耶稣的追随者的协约）
(基督教神学)旧约（《圣经•旧约》中上帝和以色列人的协约）

trans.tran_cn: 协议，协定，盖印合同，[法律]契约条款，[宗教]誓约
trans.tran_en: a legal agreement in which someone promises to pay a person or organization an amount of money regularly
